JACE 9000 Controller Overview

The JACE 9000 is a compact, embedded IoT controller and server platform
manufactured by Tridium. It runs the Niagara Framework and provides:

- BACnet/IP and BACnet MS/TP connectivity
- Web-based configuration and graphics
- Support for multiple field protocols
- Built-in alarming and scheduling

Installation requires 24VAC power supply and Ethernet connectivity.
Default IP configuration uses DHCP. Access the controller at port 443.
